activities:
NightOwl is a leading provider of technology-driven litigation support services that enable clients to capture, analyze, manage and produce both paper and electronic documents.

Services provided include: data collection, forensic analysis, data filtering, data processing, data hosting, attorney review, scanning of paper documents, OCR, coding, blowbacks, and copying.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client, and organization data. Will include manually processed data.
recoursemech: European Union data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
